text: Binɨb anɨb okok God nop ma chɨgɨpal tek, God nop yepɨs agnepal. Gos kɨli ke nepal tek gɨlɨg, binɨb yɨmgeptek mɨdon tep gɨnɨgab agɨl, tap asɨk mosɨk gɨl, koslam mɨdebal. Anɨgel, binɨb ogɨnap nɨgel, nɨŋɨd gebal tek lɨnɨgab ak pen, tap tɨmel gep gos ak ownɨgab. Apek, God ayɨp ma mɨdebal tek, tap olap kɨles ñek, mɨdtep gɨnɨgel tek ma mɨdeb.
